title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 69.2 - Caution arm required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 69.2 - Caution arm required

State Regulations

Every vehicle which is used to vend frozen desserts to
pedestrians on public highways or sidewalks shall be equipped with a caution
arm on the left side which meets the standards described in section
69.3
of this Part. The caution arm
shall be extended whenever the vehicle is stopped on a public highway to vend
frozen desserts. The caution arm shall be retracted whenever the vehicle is in
motion or is not being used to vend frozen desserts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
69.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
